The Escravos–Lagos Pipeline System (ELPS) bụ usoro paịpụ gas e wuru na 1989 iji nye gas site na mpaghara Escravos nke Niger Delta gaa na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik Egbin dị nso na Lagos na Nigeria

Usoro ndị ọzọ sitere na ELP na-ebufe gas nye ndị ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik Delta na Ughelli, Warri Refining and Petrochemical Company na Warri, West African Portland Cement (WAPCO) Plants dị na Shagamu nakwa Ewekoro, ụlọ ọrụ ndị dị na Ikorodu, City Gate dị na lkeja Lagos
Ebe ọ bụ na ụlọ ọrụ ike NIPP pụtara, ELPS bụ isi akwara na-enye gas na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik na Naịjirịa.
Obosara nke akụkụ bụ isi nke paịpụ site na Warri Gas Treatment Plant ruo Egbin tee na PS4 dị nso Lagos bụ inches 36 (910 mm)
Obosara nke ngalaba ahụ site na Escravos ruo Warri na site na Egbin Tee ruo Alagbado Tee na PS5 bụ inches 24 (610 mm)
Ikike nke paịpụ ahụ bụ nde 800 cu ft / d (23  m3/d) na nrụgide dị mma ma ọ naghị ezute mkpa gas a tụrụ anya ya.
Site na inches 24 (610 ) tee na Itoki:
Site na tee gaa Oben - Geregu pipeline ELPS nwere ike ibuga gaasị na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ eletrik Geregu I na II yana ụlọ ọrụ igwe Ajaokuta
ELPS na-ebukwa gaasị ọnụọgụ ya dị nde 170 scf/d (140 MWh/d) maka West African Gas Pipeline.
